:: Create and activate virtual environment
python -m venv asr-env
asr-env\Scripts\activate

:: Install core packages
pip install torch==2.0.1+cu118 torchaudio==2.0.2 --extra-index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu118
pip install transformers==4.31.0 datasets==2.14.4 sounddevice==0.4.6
pip install audiomentations==0.30.0 jiwer==2.5.1

:: Install SoX bindings (Windows-compatible)
pip install sox==1.4.1
